Class RefreshTokens

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team10.RefreshTokens

  • public class RefreshTokens
extends Object
    This class will be used to refresh tokens, handle calls to Fitbit and make sure tokens are good

    Pearson, Patrick

      • getTokens

        public static String getTokens(String requestUrl)
                        throws TokensException,
                               RateExceededException
        Method gets tokens from /src/main/resources/Team10Tokens.txt
        Parameters:
        requestUrl - String that contains a specified FitBit URL
        Returns:
        String containing the data downloaded from the URL request from the API
        Throws:
        TokensException - Method uses tokens to interface with API which can throw this error
        RateExceededException - thrown if rate limit is hit
